posts.post_title: FS: N172 OJ Mark Baldwin SGC 10
posts.post_content:
For sale:  N172 OJ Mark Baldwin SGC 10.  As "poor" OJ's go, this one has a good image.  I'm asking $110, ppd.  You can respond here, PM me, or send an email to [url]bill@t207.com[/url].  Thanks.
